item.title: Tomcat.Service
item.description: [TOC] 参考 tomcat中server.xml配置详解 Tomcat server.xml配置示例 service.xml 软件 java tomcat scp -rv /data/service/tomcat root@39.108.103.85:/data/service/tomcat 目录结构 data service bin 运行脚本 wechat-forum-dev-start.sh wechat-forum-dev-stop.sh deploy-instance.sh logs wechat-forum-dev catalina.2017-08-15.log catalina.2017-08-15.out host-manager.2017-08-15.log localhost_access_log.2017-08-15.txt manager.2017-08-15.log wechat-forum-dev_gc.log run wechat-forum-dev.pid 9015 tomcat bin 启动、运行的相关二进制启动脚本 startup.sh shutup.sh version.sh CATALINA_BASE 实例运行目录 CATALINA_HOME 安装目录 CATALINA_TMPDIR JRE_HOME CLASSPATH conf catalina.
